trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> will remain connected after a call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close*> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close*> methods and the length of time it will remain connected, if data remains to be sent.
trans-unit.target: Angir om en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>vil forbli tilkoblet etter et kall til den <> </> *> eller <> </> *> metoder og hvor lang tid det skal være tilkoblet, hvis data gjenstår å bli sendt.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: There may still be data available in the outgoing network buffer after an application calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> method.
trans-unit.target: Kan fortsatt være dataene tilgjengelige i utgående nettverk bufferen når et program kaller den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>eller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>metode.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the amount of time that the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> will attempt to transmit unsent data after closing, create a LingerOption with the `enable` parameter set to `true`, and the `seconds` parameter set to the desired amount of time.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi hvor lang tid som den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>forsøker å sende usendte data etter lukking, oppretter du en LingerOption med den `enable` parameteren satt til `true`, og `seconds` parameteren satt til ønsket hvor lenge.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: The `seconds` parameter is used to indicate how long you would like the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to remain connected before timing out.
trans-unit.target: Den `seconds` parameteren brukes til å angi hvor lenge du vil at de <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>være koblet før tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to stay connected for any length of time after closing, create a LingerOption instance with the `enable` parameter set to `true` and the `seconds` parameter set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke vil den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>for å være tilkoblet for alle tidsrom etter lukking, kan du opprette en LingerOption-forekomst med den `enable` parameteren satt til `true` og `seconds` parameteren satt til null.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> will close immediately and any unsent data will be lost.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>lukkes umiddelbart og noen usendte data vil gå tapt.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Once created, pass the LingerOption to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Når du opprettet, kan du sende LingerOption til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you are sending and receiving data with a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>, then set the LingerOption instance in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du er sending og mottak av data med en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>, angitt LingerOption-forekomst i den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>

trans-unit.source: The IP stack computes the default IP protocol time-out period to use based on the round trip time of the connection.
trans-unit.target: IP-stakken beregner tidsavbruddsperioden for standard IP-protokollen til å bruke basert på tur-retur-tid for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the time-out computed by the stack is more relevant than one defined by an application.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller gjelder tidsavbrudd beregnet av stakken mer enn én definert av en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property is not set and for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standard virkemåte for en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>når den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt og en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>når den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: There may still be data available in the outgoing network buffer after you close the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Fortsatt kan være dataene tilgjengelige i utgående nettverk bufferen når du lukker <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the `enable` parameter to specify whether you would like the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to continue transmitting unsent data after the close method is called.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `enable` å angi om du ønsker den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>fortsette dataoverføring usendte etter close-metoden blir kalt.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the `seconds` parameter to indicate how long you would like the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to attempt transferring unsent data before timing out.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `seconds` parameteren til å angi hvor lenge du ønsker den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>under forsøk på å overføre usendte data før tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `true` for the `enable` parameter and 0 for the `seconds` parameter, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> will attempt to send data until there is no data left in the outgoing network buffer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir `true` for den `enable` parameteren og 0 for den `seconds` parameteren den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>forsøker å sende data til det er ingen data venstre i den utgående nettverk-bufferen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `false` for the `enable` parameter, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> will close immediately and any unsent data will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir `false` for den `enable` parameteren den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>lukkes umiddelbart og noen usendte data vil gå tapt.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the behavior on the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods based on the possible values of the `enable` and `seconds` parameters when an T:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption instance is created and set in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver problemet på den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoder basert på mulige verdier for den `enable` og `seconds` når en T:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption-forekomst er opprettet, og angi om den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: |`enable`|`seconds`|Behavior| |--------------|---------------|--------------| |`false` (disabled), the default value|The time-out is not applicable, (default).|Attempts to send pending data for a connection-oriented socket (TCP, for example) until the default IP protocol time-out expires.| |`true` (enabled)|A nonzero time-out|Attempts to send pending data until the specified time-out expires, and if the attempt fails, then Winsock resets the connection.| |`true` (enabled)|A zero timeout.|Discards any pending data.
trans-unit.target: | `enable`|`seconds`| Virkemåte | |--------------|---------------|--------------| | `false` (deaktivert), brukes standardverdien | Tidsavbruddet er ikke tilgjengelig, (standard). | Forsøk på å sende ventende-data for en orientert socket (for eksempel TCP) til standard IP-protokoll tidsavbrudd utløper. | | `true` (aktivert) | Et tidsavbrudd for ikke-null | Prøver å sende ventende data til det angitte tidsavbruddet utløper, og hvis forsøket mislykkes, tilbakestiller Winsock tilkoblingen. | | `true` (aktivert) | Ingen tidsavbrudd. | Forkastes eventuelle ventende data.

trans-unit.source: For connection-oriented socket (TCP, for example), Winsock resets the connection.| The IP stack computes the default IP protocol time-out period to use based on the round trip time of the connection.
trans-unit.target: For orientert socket (for eksempel TCP), tilbakestiller Winsock tilkoblingen. | IP-stakken beregner tidsavbruddsperioden for standard IP-protokollen til å bruke basert på tur-retur-tid for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the time-out computed by the stack is more relevant than one defined by an application.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller gjelder tidsavbrudd beregnet av stakken mer enn én definert av en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior for a socket when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standard virkemåte for en socket når den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A> property stored in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property is set greater than the default IP protocol time-out, the default IP protocol time-out will still apply and override.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>egenskapen som er lagret i det <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>angitt større enn standard IP-protokoll tidsavbrudd, standard IP-protokoll tidsavbrudd vil fortsatt bruke og overstyre.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to remain connected after the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>forbli tilkoblet etter den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden er kall; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds to remain connected after the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Antall sekunder skal være koblet etter den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> -metoden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to linger after the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om ligge etter den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>er lukket.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Enabled property to determine whether the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> will linger after closing.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen Enabled til å bestemme om den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>vil bare etter lukking.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Change this value to `true` or `false` and pass the altered <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption> to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property.to disable or enable lingering.
trans-unit.target: Endre denne verdien til `true` eller `false` og sende det endrede <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>metoden eller sett den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>property.to deaktivere eller aktivere lingering.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the behavior for the possible values of the Enabled property and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A> property stored in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver virkemåten for mulige verdier for egenskapen Enabled og <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>egenskapen som er lagret i den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: |`enable`|`seconds`|Behavior| |--------------|---------------|--------------| |`false` (disabled), the default value|The time-out is not applicable, (default).|Attempts to send pending data for a connection-oriented socket (TCP, for example) until the default IP protocol time-out expires.| |`true` (enabled)|A nonzero time-out|Attempts to send pending data until the specified time-out expires, and if the attempt fails, then Winsock resets the connection.| |`true` (enabled)|A zero timeout.|Discards any pending data.
trans-unit.target: | `enable`|`seconds`| Virkemåte | |--------------|---------------|--------------| | `false` (deaktivert), brukes standardverdien | Tidsavbruddet er ikke tilgjengelig, (standard). | Forsøk på å sende ventende-data for en orientert socket (for eksempel TCP) til standard IP-protokoll tidsavbrudd utløper. | | `true` (aktivert) | Et tidsavbrudd for ikke-null | Prøver å sende ventende data til det angitte tidsavbruddet utløper, og hvis forsøket mislykkes, tilbakestiller Winsock tilkoblingen. | | `true` (aktivert) | Ingen tidsavbrudd. | Forkastes eventuelle ventende data.

trans-unit.source: For connection-oriented socket (TCP, for example), Winsock resets the connection.| The IP stack computes the default IP protocol time-out period to use based on the round trip time of the connection.
trans-unit.target: For orientert socket (for eksempel TCP), tilbakestiller Winsock tilkoblingen. | IP-stakken beregner tidsavbruddsperioden for standard IP-protokollen til å bruke basert på tur-retur-tid for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the time-out computed by the stack is more relevant than one defined by an application.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller gjelder tidsavbrudd beregnet av stakken mer enn én definert av en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior for a socket when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standard virkemåte for en socket når den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A> property stored in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property is set greater than the default IP protocol time-out, the default IP protocol time-out will still apply and override.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>egenskapen som er lagret i det <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>angitt større enn standard IP-protokoll tidsavbrudd, standard IP-protokoll tidsavbrudd vil fortsatt bruke og overstyre.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> should linger after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>skal ligge etter <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> er kall; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time to remain connected after calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method if data remains to be sent.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor lang tid å forbli tilkoblet etter kall av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden hvis data gjenstår å bli sendt.

trans-unit.source: Use this value if you want to determine how long a closed <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> will attempt to transfer unsent data before timing out.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne verdien hvis du vil finne ut hvordan lenge en lukket <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>vil prøve å overføre usendte data før tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: You can also set this value to the desired time-out period, in seconds.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi denne verdien til ønsket tidsavbruddsperioden i sekunder.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.Enabled%2A> property is `true`, and you set LingerTime to 0, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> discards any pending data to send in the outgoing network buffer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.Enabled%2A>egenskapen `true`, og du angir LingerTime til 0, i <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>forkastes eventuelle ventende dataene som skal sendes i den utgående nettverk-bufferen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change this value, you must pass the altered <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption> instance to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer denne verdien, må du sende det endrede <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>serverforekomsten til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>metoden eller sett den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.LingerState%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the behavior for the possible values of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.Enabled%2A> property and the LingerTime property stored in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver virkemåten for mulige verdier for den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.Enabled%2A>egenskapen og LingerTime-egenskap som er lagret i den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: |`enable`|`seconds`|Behavior| |--------------|---------------|--------------| |`false` (disabled), the default value|The time-out is not applicable, (default).|Attempts to send pending data for a connection-oriented socket (TCP, for example) until the default IP protocol time-out expires.| |`true` (enabled)|A nonzero time-out|Attempts to send pending data until the specified time-out expires, and if the attempt fails, then Winsock resets the connection.| |`true` (enabled)|A zero timeout.|Discards any pending data.
trans-unit.target: | `enable`|`seconds`| Virkemåte | |--------------|---------------|--------------| | `false` (deaktivert), brukes standardverdien | Tidsavbruddet er ikke tilgjengelig, (standard). | Forsøk på å sende ventende-data for en orientert socket (for eksempel TCP) til standard IP-protokoll tidsavbrudd utløper. | | `true` (aktivert) | Et tidsavbrudd for ikke-null | Prøver å sende ventende data til det angitte tidsavbruddet utløper, og hvis forsøket mislykkes, tilbakestiller Winsock tilkoblingen. | | `true` (aktivert) | Ingen tidsavbrudd. | Forkastes eventuelle ventende data.

trans-unit.source: For connection-oriented socket (TCP, for example), Winsock resets the connection.| The IP stack computes the default IP protocol time-out period to use based on the round trip time of the connection.
trans-unit.target: For orientert socket (for eksempel TCP), tilbakestiller Winsock tilkoblingen. | IP-stakken beregner tidsavbruddsperioden for standard IP-protokollen til å bruke basert på tur-retur-tid for tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the time-out computed by the stack is more relevant than one defined by an application.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller gjelder tidsavbrudd beregnet av stakken mer enn én definert av en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior for a socket when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standard virkemåte for en socket når den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the LingerTime property stored in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property is set greater than the default IP protocol time-out, the default IP protocol time-out will still apply and override.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen LingerTime som er lagret i det <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>angitt større enn standard IP-protokoll tidsavbrudd, standard IP-protokoll tidsavbrudd vil fortsatt bruke og overstyre.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount of time, in seconds, to remain connected after calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid i sekunder, skal forbli tilkoblet etter kall <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
